title: F1 Fantasy: top picks & predictions for the 2025 Miami GP
summary: It's time to make some big chip decisions for your 2025 F1 Fantasy Miami GP line-up. Here are our predictions; tips on drivers to avoid; which chips to play and further analysis

qa_pairs.question: What is the purpose of using chips in F1 Fantasy?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Chips are used to enhance team performance by providing strategic advantages, such as double points or the ability to transfer drivers.
wrong_options: Chips are used to increase the budget for driver selection.
Chips allow for automatic qualification into the next race.
Chips are used to replace a team principal.

qa_pairs.question: Which type of driver is typically recommended to avoid in F1 Fantasy?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Drivers who consistently finish outside the points or have unreliable performance.
wrong_options: Drivers known for good qualifying performances

qa_pairs.question: What is a common strategy for selecting drivers for an F1 Fantasy line-up?
qa_pairs.correct_answer: Balancing between high-performing star drivers and budget-friendly options.
wrong_options: Only selecting drivers from the same team
Focusing solely on rookies for potential surprises
